Subject: Error about write Heritrix's wraper
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=183106698

hi,all

I want to write a class to run Heritrix from my application,this is the code:

---------------------------------------
package org.archive.crawler;

import java.io.File;

public class Run {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
        if(args.length<1){
            System.out.println("Usage:java org.archive.crawler.run orderfile");
            System.exit(-1);
        }
        File orderfile = new File(args[0]);
        if (!orderfile.exists()){
            System.out.println("File:" + orderfile + " not exit!");
            System.exit(-1);
        }
        org.archive.crawler.Heritrix.main(new String[]{"--nowui",args[0]});
    }
}
-----------------------------------

Then use this script to run it;
-------------------------
java -Xmx256m -Dheritrix.home=J:\heritrix  org.archive.crawler.Run J:\heritrix\jobs\Simple\order.xml
-------------------------

But I get some Error msg:

----------------------------
java.io.IOException: Stream closed
	at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.ensureOpen(StreamEncoder.java:38)
	at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.flush(StreamEncoder.java:151)
	at java.io.OutputStreamWriter.flush(OutputStreamWriter.java:213)

	at org.archive.crawler.framework.CrawlController.completeStop(CrawlController.java:749)
	at org.archive.crawler.framework.CrawlController.toeChanged(CrawlController.java:1175)
	at org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.run(ToeThread.java:173)
java.io.IOException: Stream closed
	at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.ensureOpen(StreamEncoder.java:38)
	at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.flush(StreamEncoder.java:151)
	at java.io.OutputStreamWriter.flush(OutputStreamWriter.java:213)

	at org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.run(ToeThread.java:173)

can anyone give some suggestions?

many thanks.

ansi
